# Data and Libraries





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.1     ✔ stringr   1.5.2
✔ ggplot2   4.0.0     ✔ tibble    3.3.0
✔ lubridate 1.9.4     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.1.0     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(palmerpenguins)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```

Attaching package: 'palmerpenguins'

The following objects are masked from 'package:datasets':

    penguins, penguins_raw
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
source(file = "R/functions.r")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# read clean data

df_clean_data <- readRDS(file = "input/df_clean_data.rds")

#Summary
summary(df_clean_data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Calculating mean bill length for different species and islands using dplyr
df_clean_data |>
  dplyr::filter(species == "Adelie") |>
  group_by(island) |>
  summarize(
    mean_bill_length = num(mean(bill_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE), digits = 2)
  )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 3 × 2
  island    mean_bill_length
  <chr>            <num:.2!>
1 Biscoe               38.98
2 Dream                38.55
3 Torgersen            38.95
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Use function in functions.r

create_scatterplot(df_clean_data, "Adelie", "Torgersen") 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/load-data-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::




## Data Source




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
citation("palmerpenguins")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
To cite palmerpenguins in publications use:

  Horst AM, Hill AP, Gorman KB (2020). palmerpenguins: Palmer
  Archipelago (Antarctica) penguin data. R package version 0.1.0.
  https://allisonhorst.github.io/palmerpenguins/. doi:
  10.5281/zenodo.3960218.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is

  @Manual{,
    title = {palmerpenguins: Palmer Archipelago (Antarctica) penguin data},
    author = {Allison Marie Horst and Alison Presmanes Hill and Kristen B Gorman},
    year = {2020},
    note = {R package version 0.1.0},
    doi = {10.5281/zenodo.3960218},
    url = {https://allisonhorst.github.io/palmerpenguins/},
  }
```


:::
:::




The `palmerpenguins` package was created and shared by Kristen Gorman, a researcher at the Palmer Station in Antarctica. It contains data about 344 penguins, including three species of penguins on three different islands. The package is licensed under a [CC-0](https://creativecommons.org/public-domain/cc0/) license.


# Descriptive Stats
